attributes.action: legislate that all dogs are kept on leads in all public places including the countryside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are losing their enjoyment of the countryside because of the threat from people walking loose dogs. This extends to walkers, cyclists and horse riders.The owners of the dogs are very often aggresive and reluctant to put the dogs on a lead even when asked politely to do so. This confrontation should stop.The legislation should also apply to Forestry Commission land.
